get.description:
(Restricted to Logged in users) gets the shopping result using the given
identifier.

post.description: Creates a Shopping cart for a the current user.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The item to add to the shopping cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the cart to checkout.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: The Payment Details of the Card.
